0: It’s like I wanna spit something written
2: So I guess it’s from the heart from the start
4: Seemed like I just wasn’t reaching the charts
8: some nights gone off the Henny as usual
9: So unusual to be in this position
10: Everything I say everybody tryna diss ‘em
11: Everybody playin him, truth be told
12: The last nigga ever let the truth be told
13: And oh Mos Def ran to my home
14: And said they gon have yo ass gone
15: Light jokes, you keep playin with them white folks
18: Cut all the sponsorship for the touring!
19: “Where the Dark Fantasy tour at Ye?”
20: I dont know, ask, ask Hennesy (thats Coca-Cola)
23: Enough lashes like I ain't seen enough
25: this is like the neo-Emmitt Till
26: Whistling, get yo fuckin' ass killed
30: And everyday of my life, people try to tell me that I hate the whites
32: I go to sleep and deal wit it every night
34: And walk to the liquor store or coffee store shop on the Mersa whats worser?
35: Its no verse that would reverse the-
37: They curse the name, or maybe call me Kane
38: Let's have a ‘toast for the douche bags’
39: Black people wanna talk about me on blogs
40: Cause I like clothes like, 'look at this fag'
41: Thats what I have to deal wit real shit
42: Yall dont even understand, what it take to be a real man
43: A black man interested in art, speaking from the heart and playin’ my part
44: And all this illuminati talk, like my first hit single wasn't ‘Jesus Walks’
45: For many years, these ain't rhymes these is muthaf-cking tears
47: Felt like I’m the only real nigga here
49: They kicked me out the awards and my nigga Diddy left
50: Then they even sent Beyonce up to give the Award back
51: Didn’t even know I afford that
52: And she rode the wave as I rode the slave
53: As I felt like a slave as they try to put my shit up in the grave
56: I bet ya no one else would ever say nuttin’ and stay frontin’
57: And get up and just perform, Shit is enormous
58: Shout out to Steve Stout, you know what this shit ’bout
59: My whole family, now I’m scared of Grammy’s
60: Cause everybody know that Dark Fantasy was the highest rated album in history
61: So I just avoided it, not to be exploited, not to be recorded
62: Cause I cannot afford it, I cannot afford more shit to be impor-ted
63: Uh, it’s too real for these niggas, you feel for these niggas
64: How I feel to be a black man, you say something wrong, nobody understand
65: Money, power, black, opinion, pick two, they would kill ya
title: Blue Note NYC Freestyle
